Oregon is a testing ground for extreme ballot measures
Volunteer Now

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Make sure you defend civil rights and civil liberties in Oregon by voting NO on Measure 105 and Measure 106.

❌ Measure 105 would get rid of our 31-year-old law that prohibits police from targeting people based on the color of their skin, their accent, or their perceived immigration status.

❌ Measure 106 is a backdoor ban on abortion that would reduce access to health care for low-income Oregonians and public employees like teachers and firefighters.

Get Involved! Sign up to volunteer with us to tell Oregonians why voting NO on Measures 105 and 106 is important.

Every vote counts and the stakes are high. Be sure to vote NO on 105 and 106 and turn in your ballot by November 6.

Thanks you,

david rogers
Executive Director, ACLU of Oregon
